description: An endoscopy unit refers to a dedicated area where medical procedures  performed with endoscopes,which are cameras used to visualize structures within the body

name: EEG
description: An electroencephalogram (EEG) is a test used to find problems related to electrical activity of the brain. An EEG tracks and records brain wave patterns.
